did.unittitle: Leonard Woodcock Addresses to ILR School Audio-Visual Materials
did.abstract: February 21, 1973 address to the ILR School by Mr. Woodcock, the President of the United Auto Workers Union.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Leonard Freel Woodcock (1911-2001) was President of the United Auto Workers (1970-1977) and the US Ambassador to the People's Republic of China (1979-1981).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: February 21, 1973 address to the ILR School.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Leonard Woodcock Addresses to ILR School Audio-Visual Materials #/3021 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
